metadata.title: Come Home
description: Luminate unveils their first full length album featuring their radio hit "Come Home." Best described as passionate, stirring and worshipful, Luminate's musical core is formed around an ambient rock sound. Their songs challenge us to rise above the apathy in today's society, and to pursue our dreams with purpose, while reminding us our lives and what we do has worth. With the drive to reach as many people as they can the band hit the road, touring the country relentlessly with well established acts like Superchick, Chasen and others before hitting the studio to record the songs for their upcoming release. Bringing an abundance of emotional and epic songs to the studio, the band joined forces with highly-acclaimed producers Paul Moak and Ed Cash along with Ben Glover to record an album that is sure to find its way onto a lot of "best of" lists for 2011.
